headline: IMPALA Appoints Ann Marie Dunne as New Chair, Succeeding Jonathan Taylor
summary: PISCATAWAY, N.J., Oct. 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- IMPALA, a global consortium dedicated to advancing digital and analytics-driven quality in biopharmaceutical development, announced the appointment of Ann Marie Dunne, Global Head of R&D Quality and Compliance at Biogen, as its new Chair. She succeeds Jonathan Taylor, Vice President and Global Head of Product Development Quality at Roche, who has served as Chair since IMPALA’s inception. Known for her ability to bridge innovation and execution,
